Welcome to The C.B. Discord Bot

The C.B. is a multi-purpose Discord bot designed to enhance your server experience. With a variety of features and customization options, The C.B. is the perfect addition to any Discord community.

Click the button below to authorize The C.B. with your Discord server:

We do apprecate our users! We are currently finding a way to setup our bot on a hosting system but remember that this site is still work in progress
